alert.note: Alert for Frontier (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 9:07PM CDT until August 04 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR FRONTIER COUNTY... At 907 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eustis to 8 miles north of Indianola, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Curtis, Eustis, Moorefield, Stockville, Medicine Creek Reservoir State Recreation Area, Quick, Orafino, Freedom, Dancing Leaf Earth Lodge and Bluegill Haven Campground. This includes Highway 83 between mile markers 29 and 37. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
